page.title: 03ABERDEEN: A CHINESE CHILD.
page.content:
ABERDEEN: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHINESE CHILD. I am a pupil at Seaton Primary School. I get up at 8 o'clock and go to the bathroom to wash, and brush my teeth. I put on my school uniform and have my breakfast. I drink tea and eat five biscuits.
On my way to school I buy sweeties and juice and keep them in my schoolbag for playtime.
In school I am busy. I do maths, mental arithmetic and English and reading. At 12.15 I go home for my lunch: today I have rice, fish and icecream.
In the afternoon we do gym and project work and at 3.30 I go home.
